definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: To retire after success is the tao of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 功成而身退，這才合於天道。

sentences.english: I deem that a king conforming to Tao should be selfless.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲合於道的君王應該是大公無私的。
